name: Premier Manager
description:
The definitive pick up and play experience! Highlighting playability and ease of use, Premier Manager® is the ideal game for both hardcore and casual game players who share a common interest or passion for the Beautiful Game. Can you handle the high pressure, high stakes world of top-flight soccer management?

Key Features:
- Interface: Updated and enhanced for HD.
- Leaderboards: Rate yourself against your friends and rivals and rise to the top of the ranks to become the true "Premier Manager".
- Database: Play in 16 of the world’s best leagues with over 500 clubs to choose from.
- Downloadable Content - Regular game, transfer and competition updates.

1 Player
5MB minimum save game
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
Network Features



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
